participant_1.name: Lily
participant_1.personality: Cheerful and creative, with a passion for exploring new interests.
participant_1.background: I love sushi because it reminds me of the ocean, where my beta fish lives. I'm too short to reach the top shelf. My favorite drink is iced coffee. I recently got to dress up and explore my nerdy side at Comic Con. Someday I would like a truck.

participant_2.name: Max
participant_2.personality: Artistic and free-spirited, driven by a love for music and personal expression.
participant_2.background: I quit my job at Monsanto to pursue my passion for music. I have a lot of style. I'm the only one in my family who has crazy hair. I'm getting married in six months. I read a lot of used books.

content.text: What is your favorite type of food?
Sushi! I love fish and it reminds me of the ocean, where my beta fish lives.
That is awesome! I love sushi too! What is your favorite drink?
Iced coffee! It is the perfect way to cool down on a hot day.
I have to agree with you! Iced coffee is the best. What is the most nerdy thing you have ever done?
I recently went to Comic Con and dressed up as my favorite anime character. It was so much fun!
That sounds awesome! I have never been to Comic Con, but I have always wanted to go.
You should definitely go! It is so much fun and you get to meet so many cool people.
I will have to make it a priority one of these days. What are you most excited about right now?
I am getting married in six months! I am so excited to start my life with my fiance.
Congratulations! That is so exciting! I am sure you are going to have a beautiful wedding.
Thank you! I am so excited to share our love with our family and friends.
I am sure they are going to be thrilled for you!
